ULB-Darmstadt: HTML5 web component for editing/viewing RDF data that conform to SHACL shapes
Danielbeeck: TypeScript form builder based on Web Components, using SHACL shapes as definitions

TopQuadrant: Enterprise SHACL environment with form generation driven by DASH vocabulary (dash:editor, dash:viewer, sh:group, sh:order, etc.)
SHAPEness Metadata Editor (EPOS-EU): Java desktop application; SHACL-driven multi-view editor (graph, form, tree) for RDF metadata
